headline: Edwards Lifesciences Refocuses On Core TAVR And Mitral Growth Story
summary: Edwards Lifesciences (NYSE:EW) is ending its planned acquisition of JenaValve. The company is redirecting the capital that would have gone to the deal into its internal transcatheter aortic valve replacement (TAVR) and mitral valve programs. This move reflects a shift toward developing in house platforms instead of expanding through this external transaction. Edwards Lifesciences is a major player in structural heart therapies, with TAVR and mitral valve technologies at the center of its...

headline: Edwards Lifesciences to Present at the TD Cowen 46th Annual Health Care Conference
summary: IRVINE, Calif., February 02, 2026--Edwards Lifesciences Corporation (NYSE: EW) today announced it will participate in the TD Cowen 46th Annual Health Care Conference on Monday, Mar. 2, 2026.
